title: Club tag not showing! - Clicked show club tag
body:
Hi there,

I have been through the boards for a fix.

My club has 8 members and i have clicked show club tag. I have even tried hide club tag in the event it may be inverse, still nothing.
I have also tried remaking the club and still will not show!!! 

Please help!

Thank you.

replies.body: It looks like your club hasn't actually had a club tag made for it yet. You'll need to first create that tag before you're able to show it. Let me know if the club won't let you make that tag and I may be able to help you get it made!
Oh, you need to click on the lock next to your club name. Thanks!
Thx Man U just solve my problems too.
